content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal Mine at position (43.0, -82.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position 43.0, -82.0) 
- Furnace (position 41.0, -82.0) 
- Chest (position 42.5, -83.5) 
- Burner inserter (position 43.5, -80.5) 
- Chest (position 44.5, -81.5) 
- Chest (position 43.5, -79.5)

### Coal Storage at position (45.5, -80.5)
Consists of:
- Chest (position 45.5, -80.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items
- Ensure the chest is not full before attempting to extract items.
- Make sure the entity has enough fuel to perform the extraction.
- Check the entity's inventory to ensure it has the required items to extract.
### Errors when mining
- Ensure the chest at the drop position is not full to continue mining.
- Make sure the burner mining drill has enough fuel to continue mining.
### Errors when using inserter
- Ensure the chest at the drop position is not full to continue inserting items.
- Make sure the inserter has enough space in the destination to insert items.
